data.name: The Chronicles of Dragon Wing - Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
12 characteristic skins are waiting you, including Nightmare Tyrant, Fallen Angle, and The Apocalypse series.

Skin list

  • Ice Saintess-Candy girl
  • Exterminator-Assassin legend
  • Ninja-Shogun
  • Armored Warrior-Nightmare Tyrant
  • The Death-Joker
  • Frost whisper-Frost Queen
  • Guardian Angel-Fallen Angel
  • Temple Guard-Assault Titan
  • Paladin-Apocalypse: Famine
  • Armored Warrior -Apocalypse: Conquest
  • Battlefield Tiger -Apocalypse: Slaughter
  • Queen of War-Apocalypse: Death

tips:After buying this DLC, all skin will be sent to your bag as an item. If you don’t want one of them, or you already have one, you can resolve it and get crystals of its value.

fullgame.name: The Chronicles of Dragon Wing - Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,10（32or64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, Intel® HD Graphics 4400, ATI Radeon™ HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
